snippet: Andrej Kramaric, who joined Leicester City for a club-record fee last year, has signed for German side Hoffenheim on a permanent deal, the Premier League champions said on Twitter on Wednesday....

headline.main: Kramaric Completes Permanent Move to Hoffenheim
headline.print_headline: Kramaric Completes Permanent Move to Hoffenheim

lead_paragraph: Andrej Kramaric, who joined Leicester City for a club-record fee last year, has signed for German side Hoffenheim on a permanent deal, the Premier League champions said on Twitter on Wednesday.

snippet: Newcastle United have signed Senegal midfielder Henri Saivet on a five-and-a-half year deal from Ligue 1 side Bordeaux, the relegation-threatened Premier League club said on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Newcastle United have signed Senegal midfielder Henri Saivet on a five-and-a-half year deal from Ligue 1 side Bordeaux, the relegation-threatened Premier League club said on Monday.

snippet: Belgian winger Adnan Januzaj is poised to return to Manchester United after a disappointing loan spell at Borussia Dortmund, British media reported on Wednesday....

headline.main: Januzaj Poised for Man United Return-Reports
headline.print_headline: Januzaj Poised for Man United Return-Reports

lead_paragraph: Belgian winger Adnan Januzaj is poised to return to Manchester United after a disappointing loan spell at Borussia Dortmund, British media reported on Wednesday.

snippet: Arsenal's German centre back Per Mertesacker will be sidelined for a few months with a knee problem, the Premier League club's manager Arsene Wenger told a news conference on Tuesday....

headline.main: Arsenal's Mertesacker Out for a 'Few Months' Says Wenger
headline.print_headline: Arsenal's Mertesacker Out for a 'Few Months' Says Wenger

lead_paragraph: Arsenal's German centre back Per Mertesacker will be sidelined for a few months with a knee problem, the Premier League club's manager Arsene Wenger told a news conference on Tuesday.

snippet: West Ham set a new club points record in the Premier League with Mark Noble scoring twice in an easy victory at West Bromwich Albion that boosts their hopes of European football next season....

headline.main: West Ham Still Pressing for Europe After Win at West Brom
headline.print_headline: West Ham Still Pressing for Europe After Win at West Brom

lead_paragraph: West Ham set a new club points record in the Premier League with Mark Noble scoring twice in an easy victory at West Bromwich Albion that boosts their hopes of European football next season.

snippet: Manchester City striker Sergio Aguero will contest a Football Association charge of violent conduct, British media reported on Thursday....

snippet: Manchester City's Premier League title hopes were dealt another stinging blow as Liverpool gained revenge for their League Cup final defeat with a comprehensive 3-0 win at Anfield on Wednesday....

headline.main: Man City Title Hopes Hit by 3-0 Defeat to Liverpool
headline.print_headline: Man City Title Hopes Hit by 3-0 Defeat to Liverpool

lead_paragraph: Manchester City's Premier League title hopes were dealt another stinging blow as Liverpool gained revenge for their League Cup final defeat with a comprehensive 3-0 win at Anfield on Wednesday.

snippet: Twelve months after Jamie Vardy earned worldwide fame for scoring in a record 11th Premier League match in succession, he is suffering a barren spell that mirrors Leicester City's fall from domestic grace....

headline.main: Leicester Goal Machine Vardy Splutters to a Halt
headline.print_headline: Leicester Goal Machine Vardy Splutters to a Halt

lead_paragraph: Twelve months after Jamie Vardy earned worldwide fame for scoring in a record 11th Premier League match in succession, he is suffering a barren spell that mirrors Leicester City's fall from domestic grace.

headline.print_headline: Dann Goal Ends Run of Five Successive Defeats for Palace

snippet: James Ward-Prowse scored twice as Southampton beat West Bromwich Albion 3-0 at St Mary's on Saturday for a convincing third successive Premier League home victory....

headline.main: Saints March on With 3-0 Home Win Against West Brom
headline.print_headline: Saints March on With 3-0 Home Win Against West Brom

lead_paragraph: James Ward-Prowse scored twice as Southampton beat West Bromwich Albion 3-0 at St Mary's on Saturday for a convincing third successive Premier League home victory.
